content: For example, imagine that someone has heard a rumor that a co-worker is difficult to work with. When they are assigned to work with that co-worker on a project, they may interpret their co-worker's actions in a negative light, even if those actions could be interpreted in a more neutral or positive way. This is because their expectation that their co-worker is difficult has influenced their perception of the situation, causing them to see things in a way that confirms their preconceived notion.
